name: Cosmic
description: The Cosmic project introduces the ERC-404 Smart Contract to create liquid NFTs, linking them with the $COSMIC token to enhance liquidity and tradeability in the NFT market. This innovation allows for instant trading of NFTs, addressing the liquidity issue common in traditional NFTs. Additionally, Cosmic offers staking mechanisms for users to earn rewards and ensures high security with a locked liquidity pool. The project aims to revolutionize NFT trading by making it more accessible and efficient. We will provide users the best possible advantages from this new token standard.
